__e: Will you give me a kiss goodnight ?
Give me back my jacket right now. Hot lips, what about a good night kiss?
Just do what I say, and by the time we give them a kiss on the cheek to say good night,
Come give mommy a kiss, just like the one you gave your brother, David.
If you hear that I planted a big kiss on your husband, just don't ask any questions.
I owe them this much. A big kiss for my beloved kids.
